attributes.action: introduce a new immigration stream for all Ukrainians to come to the UK.
attributes.additional_details: This is a mass exodus of a highly educated European population from a westernized community. They are skilled individuals fleeing for their lives, livelihoods and the sake of their families.
attributes.background: To introduce a new immigration stream for all Ukrainians who want to come to the United Kingdom temporarily. To enable a full UK-Ukraine Authorization for Emergency Travel, and work permits available for those fleeing conflict.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions, which call for related actions:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382

Help Ukrainian refugees and create a safe path for them to get to the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609574

Draw up and implement a specific Ukrainian refugee strategy for the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609431
